name: Paraopticon
description:
Paraopticon

is a Spot the Difference / Puzzle Game, where you are a security guard that is task to
compare camera feeds and spot and report different events to survive the night shift.

Gameplay:

The rules are simple:
You have 15-30 ingame-minutes to memorize the rooms.
At 12:00 AM Anomalies will appear; You have to report them;
Too many anomalies unreported will have you killed.
You have to make it to 6:00 AM.

Keep your eyes peeled

Be aware: hundreds of anomalies per level and thousands of possibilities.

Be scared: special events an entities to observe and save yourself from.

Be prepared: use different items to help you find the anomalies.

Features:


  • HD Graphics.
  • Many different Items.
  • Alot and i mean aaaaalot of Anomalies.
